title: Cardi B joins the cast of Fast & Furious 9
text:
Cape Town - Rapper Cardi B has bagged yet another movie role and this time it’s in one of the biggest film franchises around.

Fast & Furious star Vin Diesel shared a video on Instagram revealing the rapper has been cast in the ninth installment of the franchise. The two are currently in the United Kingdom filming scenes for the movie, which will be released in May next year, People reports.

READ MORE: Cardi B bags a film debut in stripper revenge movie

The Bodak Yellow hitmaker recently made her film debut as a stripper in hit film Hustlers and this is her second big-screen role.

“Day 86 here on the set of Fast 9, we all gave every single thing we could for this movie,” Vin said in his Insta video.

Cardi nodded in agreement and shared how excited she was to have a role in the movie. “But I can’t wait. I ain’t gonna front, I think this is gonna be the best one.”

READ MORE: Cardi B explains how she stopped her period to have sex with Offset

Wrestler John Cena has also joined the film in an undisclosed role and recently revealed he felt he had to “earn the respect” of the Fast & Furious family, Entertainment Weekly reports.

Check out the video below:
description: Fast & Furious star Vin Diesel shared a video on Instagram revealing the rapper has been cast in the ninth installment of the franchise.
